title: Pembrokeshire Stag & Hen Adventure
suitableFor: Active stag or hen groups looking for an adrenaline-filled coastal adventure. Requires a basic level of fitness and a willingness to get wet!
notSuitableFor: Those with limited mobility, a strong aversion to cold water, or who prefer purely relaxing holidays. The focus is on physical activities.

stops.description: Explore the rugged coastline with jumps, swims, and scrambles led by experienced guides at the iconic Blue Lagoon.

wetAlt.title: Explore St Davids Cathedral

wetAlt.title: Indoor Climbing at Haverfordwest Leisure Centre

budgetAlt.title: Bodyboarding at Whitesands Beach

knowBeforeYouGo.weather: Pembrokeshire weather can be unpredictable. Pack layers and be prepared for rain, even in summer. Check the forecast before heading out.
knowBeforeYouGo.traffic: Traffic can be heavy in St Davids and surrounding areas during peak season. Arrive early to secure parking, especially at popular beaches like Whitesands. Consider using the Puffin Shuttle bus service to avoid driving.
knowBeforeYouGo.booking: Advance booking is essential for coasteering, surfing lessons, and boat trips, especially for large groups. Book accommodation well in advance, particularly during school holidays.
knowBeforeYouGo.fitness: A moderate level of fitness is required for coasteering, surfing, and kayaking. Be prepared for some physical exertion. Inform the activity providers of any medical conditions or fitness limitations.
